items.description: Our legendary wing sauce is generously slathered onto 6 original Hooters Buffalo shrimp, 6 boneless wings and 6 original Hooters style wings.
items.title: Hooters Original Buffalo Platter

items.description: Plump strips of juicy chicken fried up to crispy perfection. Feeling spicy? Have them tossed in one of our world-famous wing sauces.
items.title: Chicken Breast Strips

items.description: Spring mix greens stacked with breaded chicken tossed in your favorite wing sauce. Topped with diced tomatoes, bleu cheese crumbles, onions and cilantro and your choice of bleu cheese or ranch dressing.
items.title: Hooters Original Buffalo Chicken Salad

items.description: An iceberg lettuce and cabbage mix, topped with pico de gallo, shredded cheese, cilantro, sour cream, fresh guacamole and chili. Served on a bed of tortilla chips with a tangy lime vinaigrette.
items.title: Taco Salad

items.description: Like a cowboy on spring break. Decked out with Hooters original Daytona beach sauce, caramelized onions, bacon and cheddar cheese and served on Texas toast.
items.title: Twisted Texas Melt

items.description: BBQ sauce, melted cheddar cheese, bacon and onion rings pilled high on a toasted brioche bun.
items.title: Western BBQ Burger

items.description: Grilled or battered and fried to crispy perfection, either way you'll feel like you're on a beach in Mexico. Served on warm tortillas with pico de gallo, fresh cabbage and a special sauce.
items.title: Baja Fish Tacos

items.description: Everything you love about our wings, but in a sandwich. Hand-breaded chicken breast tossed in your favorite wing sauce, topped with lettuce and tomato and served on a toasted brioche bun. Choice of fries.
items.title: Hooters Original Buffalo Chicken Sandwich

items.description: We don't skimp on the shrimp. It's seasoned and grilled then loaded with cabbage, pico de gallo and a special sauce and wrapped in flour tortillas.
items.title: Baja Shrimp Tacos

items.description: Served with seasoned tortilla chips, fresh-made guacamole and pico de gallo.
items.title: Wise Choice Grilled Blackened Shrimp

items.description: Spring mix greens piled with diced tomatoes, crisp cucumbers and cheese.
items.title: Wise Choice Salad

items.description: Traditional chili served the wise choice way.
items.title: Wise Chili

items.description: 3 grilled fish tacos served the wise choice way.
items.title: Wise Choice Fish Tacos

items.description: 3 grilled shrimp tacos served the wise choice way.
items.title: Wise Choice Shrimp Tacos

items.description: Grilled, blackened mahi-mahi with lettuce, tomato and sliced onion served on a toasted brioche bun.
items.title: Grilled Blackened Mahi-Mahi Sandwich and Wise Choice Salad

items.description: Grilled chicken breast topped with lettuce and tomato and served on a toasted brioche bun.
items.title: Grilled Chicken Sandwich and Wise Choice Salad
